Module org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker
Package org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.gui.controllers

Class QuizAdminPage

java.lang.Object
org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.gui.controllers.QuizAdminPage
public class QuizAdminPage extends Object
Controller class for the AdminPage. This page is an interface for editing and manipulating questions.

  • Method Details

    • onChangeState

      void onChangeState()
      Provides user-feedback when the quiz status is changed.

    • onDetails

      void onDetails(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Redirects to the quizDetailspage when the details button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event when the button is pressed.

    • onEditQuestion

      void onEditQuestion(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Redirects to the questionEditorPage when the edit questions button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event when the button is pressed.

    • onEditTeams

      void onEditTeams()
      Opens URL to the Google sheet of the quiz in the default web-browser. This is done by checking the os and calling the appropriate shell command to open a web-site.

    • onExportQA

      void onExportQA()
      Opens new window and sets its scene to exportPage.fxml This method is called when the export quiz button is pressed.

    • onRetrieveScores

      void onRetrieveScores()
      Retrieve scores from the Google API. If the retrieve scores button has been pressed.

    • update

      void update()
      Updates the GUI elements according to the current quiz.

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initializes the page. It creates a navigation bar and updates the gui elements according to the quiz in the singleton.
